priority_order.reason: If 'inorganic' is mentioned, the product is NOT organic (even if 'organic' also appears)
If 'organic' is mentioned (and no 'inorganic'), the product is organic

instructions: Check title for organic keywords using PRIORITY ORDER. Check 'inorganic' FIRST (priority 1), then 'organic' (priority 2). If neither found, default to NOT ORGANIC.
edge_case_example: Title: 'Supplement with organic and inorganic minerals' → Contains BOTH keywords → Check 'inorganic' first (Priority 1) → Result: NOT ORGANIC
